assertions.assertion: Open a new session with the DomainId equal to SAHPI_UNSPECIFIED_DOMAIN_ID. Expected return: SA_OK.
Open a new session when the DomainId does not exists. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_DOMAIN.
Open a new session passing a buffer for security parameters. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
Open a new session passing a NULL pointer for the SessionId. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
Open a new session with a specific DomainId. Expected return: SA_OK.
